name: Blackbird Cage
description: A bird cage holding a bird, a memory, a motivator.

name: Special Melody
description: A specially written jazz song made for the piano.

name: Precious timepiece
description: A precious, hand-crafted pocketwatch.

name: Antique dagger
description: An exciting yet intricately designed dagger

name: Favorite collection
description: A collection of interesting and perhaps favored books

name: Handrawn sketch
description: A hand-drawn sketch of...?

name: Braided bracelet
description: A hand-braided bracelet meaning...?

name: Riceball
description: A small yet hearty riceball... perhaps a sign of friendship?

name: Antique Cigarette Case
description: A rather expensive-looking cigarette case.

name: Beer
description: A bottle of lukewarm beer.

name: Knight's ring
description: A ring that seems to be rather important.

name: Pen collection
description: A collection of hand-crafted glass pens. Rather expensive-looking!

name: Sweets
description: A handful of delectable sweets

name: Lexicon on Flora
description: An old book containing depictions of and information on different types of flora. It looks well-worn

name: Combat knife
description: A Capricornian-issue combat knife. Thankfully, it looks unused.

name: Golden brooch
description: A gem-encrutsed brooch in the shape of a sun.

name: Old tome
description: An extremely heavy-looking, old book. Apparently it was gifted to him before he gifted it to you. There appears to be a bird feather being used as a bookmark.

name: Bird feather bookmark
description: A rather beautiful, feather-shaped bookmark. It looks as if it's been used.

name: Book on law
description: A really thick book on the laws of Signum...

name: Piano
description: A large, expensive piano... with no player, no music sheet.

name: A pair of horn-rimmed glasses
description: A pair of glasses? Do you need them? He seems to need them more than you, but...

name: Hand-made pastries
description: An assortment of cat-themed, hand-made pastries. There's a little note on the side that reads 'You are meowsome!' The gift-giver is staring at you rather expectantly and hopefully, so maybe you should try a piece now...?

name: A bird feather
description: A single blackbird feather. She seems to know that you know the meaning behind it.
